abstract: Outputs the string value of the document by extracting the string values from all text nodes.
rawMarkdown:
--- source: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/Foundation/XMLDocument/ContentKind/text crawled: 2025-12-07T12:00:10Z --- # XMLDocument.ContentKind.text **Case** Outputs the string value of the document by extracting the string values from all text nodes. ## Declaration ```swift case text ``` ## Enumeration Cases - **XMLDocument.ContentKind.html**: Outputs empty tags in HTML without a close tag, such as `
`. - **XMLDocument.ContentKind.xhtml**: The document output is XHTML. - **XMLDocument.ContentKind.xml**: The default type of document content type, which is XML.

items.description:
Outputs empty tags in HTML without a close tag, such as `
`.

title: XMLDocument.ContentKind.text
